description: Funny & Cute Christmas Coffee Mug & Tea Cup

Bright up your holiday season and your mornings with this perfect Christmas office mug for every tea or coffee enthusiasts. Drink your favorite beverage in the funniest way during meetings or simple gathering with friends and family.
The text in the design reads: no matter what it looks like i am doing i am golfing in my head right now
You can make this Christmas coffee cup one of a kind with our custom option with different fonts an colors available to you.

GREAT GIFT IDEA: Perfect for someone who is looking for golf cute mugs, sports gag gifts, play golf tea mug, love sports ceramic mug, loves golf, golfer gifts, golf gifts, gifts for golfers, coffee cup, funny mugs, hilarious coffee cups, white elephant gift, housewarming gifts, gifts for coworkers, friend birthday gifts, and wedding shower gifts.
